About Me

I have a passion for making beautiful responsive websites, skateboarding, and being goofy.

Things I Enjoy..

After a very long hiatus away from my true passion, i found my way back to designing and developing websites. I've become obsessed with the things we can do today compared to 2005, from Responsive Design to functionality, websites today are truly a work of art.

This is my dog Daisy. She is a 100% purebred Beagle. There are two types of Beagles. There are Beagles that don't exceed 13 inches in height at the shoulder and beagles that stand 13-15 inches in height at he shoulder. Daisy is 14 inches at the shoulder and still growing. She has a very wildly stubborn personality. She is incredibly sweet and loves attention. She has many friends at the local dog parks.

Skateboarding

I will forever be grateful for skateboarding, its molded me into the person i am today. Its my meditation from the everyday stresses of life, it keeps me grounded, and it's great exercise!

Coding

I'm a professional at my craft. I will take your personalized design and make it a reality for the world to see. From wireframes to deployment if you can think it, i can build it

Traveling

I've lived in many different parts of the U.S. I love exploring new places and trying new things. The coolest place i've been is the Grand Canyon.
